Value.label: Relay On/Off Status Saved Enable
Backlight Enable
Value.Help: This parameter defines the backlight state for touch button. The backlight led is on when wall switch power on if this parameter is set to ‘Enable’, otherwise the backlight led is off. The default value is ‘Enable’.

Value.label: Relay On/Off Indicate
Value.Help: This Parameter defines the relays state. The led will be turn on with pink color when the button is touched to turn on relay if this parameter is set to ‘Enable’; otherwise the led state is not changed. The default value is ‘Enable’.
